title: How to learn HTML
content: Hypertext refers to links that connect web pages to one another, either within a single website or between websites. Links are a fundamental aspect of the Web. By uploading content to the Internet and linking it to pages created by other people, you become an active participant in the World Wide Web.  HTML uses markup to annotate text, images, and other content for display in a Web browser. HTML markup includes special elements such as
author: Harry bhai
